recipes.title: Herby Seitan & Barley, Steamed
recipes.description: A lunch-friendly Nigerian dish featuring seitan and barley with a herby twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and drained aromatics.
Steamed the seitan with salt, pepper, and herby profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the barley separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine seitan, vegetables, and barley; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
